title: #104 Lohan Beach Recap #2 with Scott Evans + #RHONJ Recap
itunes:title: #104 Lohan Beach Recap #2 with Scott Evans + #RHONJ Recap
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes Scott Evans (Grace & Frankie) to recap episode 2 of Lindsay Lohan's Beach Club. They discuss supervillain Brent, Billy's emergence, the ladies banding together to take down a common enemy, and Panos. Plus, Danny recaps this...
description:
Danny welcomes Scott Evans (Grace & Frankie) to recap episode 2 of Lindsay Lohan's Beach Club. They discuss supervillain Brent, Billy's emergence, the ladies banding together to take down a common enemy, and Panos. Plus, Danny recaps this week's #RHONJ where Milania showcased her new iconic pop anthem.


Scott Evans: 4:09

#RHONJ: 52:22ish


*To support this podcast & for bonus eps, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
